website_summaries.verdict: Though you may have difficulties with germination if conditions aren't ideal, these seeds offer an interesting variety of melons that includes watermelon, honeydew, cantaloupe and more.
cons: Some planters rave about almost 100% germination, while others weren't so successful

customer_reviews.title: Germinates great in ziploc and napkins
customer_reviews.text: Great ! seeds are germinating nice ....so excited. Hopefully i dont kill them before they can grow fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Jamile Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great cale
customer_reviews.text: Mostly all seeds sprouted and plants are growing beautifully. Cant wait to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: lorin

customer_reviews.title: Packinging is good
customer_reviews.text: I have not planted any of these but they came in a nice package and seem to be a great product. I will review if anything changes after I plant these.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t transplant
customer_reviews.text: They do sprout after a few weeks but transplanting is a nightmare. They all died but a couple. So don’t try to start as seedlings like I did but just directly in the ground. This may be just a plant thing for them but sad
customer_reviews.author: Carly R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. Received and described. The only problem I had was with delivery.. Has nothing to do with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to see if they grow the package they ...
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to see if they grow the package they came in was sealed tight and keeps them in a dark air tight bag
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Koons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great! We are in Texas, and they grow well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will be putting to use in philippines
customer_reviews.text: I will be sending the seeds to the Philippines where i stay seasonally. I have purchased many non gmo non hybrid seeds for my own use and and to help feed my local community. Seed count per pack was few more than stated. Great!
customer_reviews.author: David Lee Martin

customer_reviews.title: 100% organic
customer_reviews.text: I wanted organic fruits and vegetables for the family and these are great and for the amount you get for the value I think its pays for itself
customer_reviews.author: tai

customer_reviews.title: Plentiful, great packaging and instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this purchase, packaging, plentiful with good instructions and tips.
customer_reviews.author: shonda

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds!
customer_reviews.text: All seeds sprouted quickly and grew healthy and sweet melons
customer_reviews.author: julie henselman

customer_reviews.title: Dead seeds
customer_reviews.text: Did a test sprout and only 10% of the seeds sprouted. Once planted in starter soil another 5% didn’t survive. Seeds are old and won’t germinate
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged - good value?
customer_reviews.text: Seems well contained, not sure why they all seem to be melon seeds, I don't really like melon! When it said "fruit seeds" I thought there would be a variety...
customer_reviews.author: C. Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Very good seeds
customer_reviews.text: I planted only water melon and rock melon but seeds germinated very quickly and have planted them and they seem to doing fine. Early yes but if they don't make it because of frost still have time to replant as I only plant 2 of each so have plenty of seeds small garden, Have also purchased air removers to repackage also keep seed in fridge so they will last even longer
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Van Lare

customer_reviews.title: a little pricy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when the S H T F and I believe it will serve me well for that purpose and at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: hodgie98

customer_reviews.title: A good way to start with food seed prep
customer_reviews.text: the sellection is what people eat and not some fill in the blank to get so many packagesof seeds to sell
customer_reviews.author: gUS mCcRACKEN

customer_reviews.title: Good selection
customer_reviews.text: The seeds came in a sturdy container and should last a long time. There was a large variety of seeds,too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Survival Fruit Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. It will store for many years, and the seeds are not hybrid, so they will actually grow food.
customer_reviews.author: + DR Good

customer_reviews.title: BE READY
customer_reviews.text: NEED TO PROTECT FAMILY. NEED FRUIT TO GO WITH VEGGIES AND THIS IS A GREAT VARIETY OF FRUIT. AND YOU CAN GATHER SEEDS SO YOU NEVER RUN OUT.
customer_reviews.author: DUSTY TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Lots of seeds
customer_reviews.text: I loved that there were a lot of seeds in this and it was packaged well. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Kilby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor germination rate
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor germination rate, but looking forward to see if the plants take off at some point. Have grown melon from seeds before, and all three of the ones from this selection that I planted this year were slow to germinate and maybe one out of 5 to 7 seeds sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to add this to my disaster/emergency kit. Great Packaging. Comes with instructions on care for the product. I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Daniel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After 5 weeks, still no sign of life. Not one seed has started to grow. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley R.

customer_reviews.title: Good batch
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the quick service. I think I am ready to plant. Worst weather in the Southwest seems to be passing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Star

customer_reviews.title: As a prepper I found this usefull
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea to have non-GMO seeds around. I like the selection of seeds in this pack plus the way they are sealed
customer_reviews.author: Kent D. Mc Caslin

customer_reviews.title: part of my prepper's kit
customer_reviews.text: have not used them yet as they are for ''when or what ever might happen'' they came nicely packages in a milar bag so should stay air tight
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for my first harvest
customer_reviews.text: Great so Far. I planted some Honey Dew Green Melon and Honey Rock Melon seeds and within a couple of days they grew their first couple of leaves. My only complain is that one of the envelopes was unidentified when I opened the package (see photo). I assume that these are the banana melon seeds since they were the only ones missing (I checked in the list that appears in the mylar bag), I guess I'll find out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: lorepao

customer_reviews.title: "Fruit" description is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Packet was thinner than shown in picture, and contains only seed melon varieties. No other fruit. Their Amazon photo shown mixed fruit in one photo. You have to read the description carefully to figure out this is only melon seeds for a high price. I will buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Hope they grow
customer_reviews.text: Havent had a chance to use these since they are for emergency. But I have a feeling it wont be long with the direction we are heading.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Item was as promised. If you're wondering how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was as promised. If you're wondering how to be forgiven of ur sins, Jesus Christ is the only way. John 14:6 and John 3:16.
customer_reviews.author: donald hogue

customer_reviews.title: I dunno yet
customer_reviews.text: I got the seeds opened the mailing envelope put them in a ziplock bag and put that into a tupperware container and threw them in my freezer. I got these just in case something happened and I could no longer just go to the store and buy fruit (Yellowstone erupts, nuke, collapse of government, trade routes shut down, zombie apocalypse etc.) I will buy another one this spring when I get my green house set up and use my frozen ones and restock with these in case my crops fail. Call me paranoid I love when people call me that but when the boats sinking and your trying to learn how to swim I'll be on my yacht.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Vivor

customer_reviews.title: Good Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I have a small organic garden and want to add some fruit so I ordered these seeds. I start all of my plants indoors from seed. These came very well packaged. Each fruit seed is in its own small envelope with all envelopes packaged together in one large sealed package. The seeds all look good but I wont know how well they germinate for a while. I'll update when I have that info. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: The seeds came packed in a mylar pouch which is great because you know they have been stored to ensure ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my heirloom seed packet and plan on planting the seeds this weekend. It’s difficult to find heirloom seeds especially non hybrid and non GMO ones. I’ve grown all types of melons and am excited to try these new varieties. The seeds came packed in a mylar pouch which is great because you know they have been stored to ensure freshness. I also plan to preserve the seeds from the fruits I harvest so that I can continue planting for years to come. Please know that I received this product at a discount or for free for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: money could be better spent just ordering seeds from a good quality organic ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, money could be better spent just ordering seeds from a good quality organic seed vendor...
customer_reviews.author: Francis W.

customer_reviews.title: Product recieved as described.
customer_reviews.text: Received my package of seeds today and was pleasantly surprised on the quantity of the seed packets, most of them have 100+. The package was done professionally and should last me just about forever! Thank you for your fast shipping, a great product, at a good price. I will definitely use your company again in the near future. Looking forward to growing my own fruit!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Germination on all products with this seller!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great review!!!!!! I bought the 47 variety package and the fruit seeds got great Germination on both products!!!! I would highly recommend both products!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ReneeMM

product_meta.title: Heirloom Fruit Seeds- Non Hybrid- Real Survival Seeds. Honeydew Green Melon, Banana Melon, Honey Rock Cantaloupe, Watermelon Crimson Sweet, Sugar Baby Watermelon Seeds, Hales Best Jumbo Melon,Non GMO
product_meta.description: Heirloom Fruit Seeds Non Hybrid Non GMO Real Survival Seeds Each variety of our Non Hybrid, Heirloom, Non GMO Seeds are package in a labeled paper envelope, (not a Ziploc or Poly bag) In a zip resealable Mylar Bag, like the Mylar Bag that The Svalbard Global Seed Vault use for storing their seeds. Planting and Harvesting Instructions are Included. Plus Instructions on how to collect new seeds from your plants, providing a Never ending food supply for generations to come. Honeydew Green Melon Seeds,, Honey Rock Cantaloupe Seeds, Watermelon Crimson Sweet Seeds, Sugar Baby Watermelon Seeds, Hales Best Jumbo Melon, Non GMO Fresh Seeds, Vegetable and fruit seeds for planting, fruit seeds, fruit seeds for planting, fruit seed vault, heirloom seeds fruit, heirloom watermelon seeds, Non-GMO fruit seeds, watermelon seeds, Non-GMO watermelon seeds
